resources.string: Hello-UG
Hello-UG
Safe boda offers a reliable ride to pick you up in minutes with the "Safe boda app". The app is available on both google play store and apple store.
Taxify boda offers the best ride to pick you up in minutes with the "taxify app". The app is available on both google play store and apple store.
Uber boda offers a reliable ride to pick you up in minutes with the "uber boda app". The app is available on both google play store and apple store.
BODA BODA

Boda boda in Uganda is one of the most populary used means of transport by people here to move around the city because of their ability to move fast by and escape traffic. Trave safe with one of our trusted boda service prviders and enjoy your ride.
SPECIAL HIRE

When you land at Entebbe International airport its possible to hire an Airport taxi that will take you to your destination.Airport Taxis change around USD 30-40 from airport to Kampala. Its arouns36kms. Safe journy.
Need a ride? UGS 2000 per km.... Just call the hotlien 0216666888 and they will pick you from wherever you are.
Get a reliable driver to pickup you in minutes with the Taxify app. It has the unveiled new lowered prices for the month to their riders.
Uber is a ridesharing app for fast, reliable rides in minutes-day or night. There is no need to park or wait for taxi or bus. Get the app now.
Entebbe Airport pick Ups and Drops off trips for making Entebbe airport Pick-up arrangements Entebbe Airport Pick-up and Drop-off transfers to and from Kampala
Quick Taxi promises cheapest fares ever around town. The minmum charge the yellow-painted taxis is UGS 900 per kilometre.
BUSES

Are you looking forward to travelling a long distance? The answer is the bus.. When compared to driving a private car, buses are more advantageous as you will not be bothered with driving , looking for parking space and any other drive-related problems.

PARKS
Kibate Forest National Park, Contains one of the loveliest and most varied tract of tropical forest in Uganda.
Lake Mburo National Park, Is the smallest of Uganda\'s savannah national parks and is located in Kiruhura District.
Bwindi National Park, It lies in southwest Uganda on the edge of the Rift Valley.
Kidepo Valley National Park, Lies in the rugged, semi arid valleys between Ugandas borders with Sudan and Kenya.
Queen Elizabeth National Park, is understandably Ugandas most popular tourist destination.
Murchion Falls national Park, lies at the northern end of the Albertine Rift Vallay, where the sweeping Bunyoro escarpment tumbles into vast, palm-dotted savanna.
Rwenzori Mountains National Park, The fabled Mountains of the Moon - lie in western Uganda along the Uganda-Congo border.
ENTERTAINMENTS
Stand in two hemispheres at the same time. The best thing to do at the Equator.
Enjoy the journey to the pick of one the tallest mountain in East Africa at mountain Rwenzori.
Enjoy the best scenery at Murchion falls in western Uganda
Some of our best games in the forest.
Sky diving at the Nile.
